title: How to Set Up Your SUPERPOS POS Register (Download, Activate, Deactivate)
description: Steps to download, activate, and deactivate your SUPERPOS POS Register.

steps.content: Access the Splash Page via your device browser to download the SuperPOS or mPOS application.
Open the app on your terminal. You will be prompted for an Activation Code. You can find or generate this code in the Backoffice under SETTINGS > Devices.
To move a license to a new device, you must first deactivate the old one in the Backoffice by clicking Edit on the device and toggling it to Inactive or removing it.
